title: Pulsatile Occurrence for Pulse Oximeter
description: Copyright 2018-2019 Open Connectivity Foundation, Inc. All rights reserved.

pulsatileoccurrence_occurrence.description: This Property describes the Pulsatile Occurrence detected by a Pulse Oximeter. BEAT - Pulsatile occurrence has occurred. BEAT_MAX_INRUSH - Maximal inrush of the pulsatile wave has occurred. NOS - No pulsatile event occurred.
